name: Munchies (itch) (ThatTrashGameDEV)
description:
A Game I made in 5 minutes as a challenge for myself anyone could donate then thanks

the aim of the game is to absorb all the balls and survive

warning its very buggy and most features dint work it takes about 40 seconds to complete

I WILL FULLY IMPROVE THIS GAME ADDING 20 LEVELS BETTER MODELS / ANIMATIONS / UI AND LOTS MORE SKINS FEATURE AS LONG AS IT MAKES £1
